synopsis.native: La relación de Coque Malla con las mujeres siempre ha sido algo de suma importancia para el músico. Con el objetivo de reafirmar esto, Malla crea 'Mujeres', un proyecto cinematográfico y musical en el que el cantante se pone tras los micros, acompañado siempre por un rostro femenino conocido.
synopsis.english: Coque Malla meets with a number of female artists during the creative process of his new musical work. Intimate essays, confidences, complicity, sense of humour and creative passion that will culminate in the live recording of the album "Mujeres" ("Women"). A journey through the life of an artist with songs and women as absolute protagonists, with the exception of his close friend, Antonio Dyaz.
